about_the_game:
She takes massage therapy very seriously, considering it both an art form and a form of meditation.

ABOUT PEARL

Age: 21
Height: 161
Blood: A
Bust size: AA
Origin: Pearl City, Hawaii.
Interests: Dancing with fire, hula, massage

You’re lucky. Not everybody gets honored by Pearl’s visit. She may be young, she is already renowned for her magical hands among the wealthiest individuals living in what’s left of the USA.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING


This DLC unlocks the legendary champion - Pearl, with 120 trust, enough to immediately reach level 10.

You will also receive an epic equipment set, allowing you to use her in missions immediately, along with a legendary look for Pearl (or its equivalent in nanites if you already have it).

And of course, by purchasing this DLC, you are supporting us. Thank you!

This DLC is non-refundable after activation.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains content not appropriate for all ages, and is not appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, some references to Substance/Alcohol Abuse.

All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

Mature content in this game includes:
- Blowjobs, Handjobs, and Sex
- Polyamory, Group Sex and Orgies
- Lesbian Sex
- Android Sex
- Consensual BDSM and bondage
- Punishment and instances of non-consensual sexual activities
